Make sure to set your alarm clock and grab some warm clothes because you wont want to miss one of the best shows over Australian skies tomorrow morning.

articles.author: Deeksha Arora
articles.title: The lunar eclipse of Wolf Moon kicks off the penumbral quartet in 2020 - Gizmo Posts 24
articles.description: The Wolf Moon passed through the faint outer shadow of the Earth, which is called the penumbra and had the moon's usual shades of black, gray, and white take on the color of the tea. The eclipse took place for four hours from 12:07 pm onward. EST (1707 GMT) a…
